languages.text: "Для того и нужны друзья, {name}. Быть рядом в горе и разделять радости — этому я научилась у вас".
"This is what friends are for, {name}. To be there for one another, in times of joy and in times of sorrow — I learned it all from you."
languages.original_text: "Для того и нужны друзья, {name}. Быть рядом в горе и разделять радости — этому я научилась у вас".

traits.locale_text: "This is what friends are for, {name}. To be there for one another, in times of joy and in times of sorrow — I learned it all from you."
"This is what friends are for, {name}. To be there for one another, in times of joy and in times of sorrow — I learned it all from you."
"This is what friends are for, {name}. To be there for one another, in times of joy and in times of sorrow — I learned it all from you."
"This is what friends are for, {name}. To be there for one another, in times of joy and in times of sorrow — I learned it all from you."
"This is what friends are for, {name}. To be there for one another, in times of joy and in times of sorrow — I learned it all from you."

languages.text: “朋友就是做这个的，{name}。无论是欢乐还是悲伤，朋友之间都要互相支持，这些全都是你教给我的。”
languages.original_text: "This is what friends are for, {name}. To be there for one another, in times of joy and in times of sorrow — I learned it all from you."

traits.locale_text: “朋友就是做这个的，{name}。无论是欢乐还是悲伤，朋友之间都要互相支持，这些全都是你教给我的。”

languages.text: «Para eso están los amigos, {name}. Para acompañarte en los momentos de júbilo y en los de pesar. Eso lo aprendí de ti».
languages.original_text: "This is what friends are for, {name}. To be there for one another, in times of joy and in times of sorrow — I learned it all from you."

traits.locale_text: «Para eso están los amigos, {name}. Para acompañarte en los momentos de júbilo y en los de pesar. Eso lo aprendí de ti».

languages.text: 「{name}、友人はこのためにあるべきでしょう。喜びの時も悲しみの時も、互いに寄り添うこと。あなたが私に教えてくれたじゃありませんか」
languages.original_text: "This is what friends are for, {name}. To be there for one another, in times of joy and in times of sorrow — I learned it all from you."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、友人はこのためにあるべきでしょう。喜びの時も悲しみの時も、互いに寄り添うこと。あなたが私に教えてくれたじゃありませんか」

languages.text: "Dafür sind Freunde doch da, {name}. Um füreinander da zu sein, in Zeiten der Freude und in Zeiten der Trauer. Das habe ich alles von Euch gelernt."
languages.original_text: "This is what friends are for, {name}. To be there for one another, in times of joy and in times of sorrow — I learned it all from you."

traits.locale_text: "Dafür sind Freunde doch da, {name}. Um füreinander da zu sein, in Zeiten der Freude und in Zeiten der Trauer. Das habe ich alles von Euch gelernt."

languages.text: « C'est à cela que servent les amis, {name}. Ils répondent présents dans la joie comme dans la peine, c'est vous-même qui me l'avez appris. »
languages.original_text: "This is what friends are for, {name}. To be there for one another, in times of joy and in times of sorrow — I learned it all from you."

traits.locale_text: « C'est à cela que servent les amis, {name}. Ils répondent présents dans la joie comme dans la peine, c'est vous-même qui me l'avez appris. »
